item.title: Don't treat your notes like blogs
item.description: Don’t treat your notes like blogs You cannot write your notes as if they were blogs. This idea opposes to [[learn in public]] and [[teaching is the best way to learn]] But at the same time I think that we should separate things that are for us and things that we can explain to other person, as [[we talk to our selves different than we talk to other people]]

item.title: How to get the most of a book
item.description: How to get the most of a book [!important] Main ideas Call to an action Big picture Many people (including me) [[The era of consumption|now days consume a lot of content]] thinking that it will help them at some point or that this information will be useful at some point - but the reality is that, even if it is educative content, the greatest probability is that you’ll forget most of it and that in reality you just wasted your time consuming that content.
